title: Auto Hunting As A Clone - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Clones   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Grinding   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Weak to Strong
author: zombie   좀비
description:
There’s too much work to do, but there’s even more that our main character Sangwoo wants to do.

To Sangwoo, who spent all day macro-ing ingame, his portal awakening has given him the ability to create clones.

With his clones, Sangwoo will endlessly develop during his growth period.>
